data.description: Chezmoi data object for use in templates

ostype.description: Determines behaviour of chezmoi, only includes files / config required for the specified platform

email.description: Email addresses used in git commits

terminal_font.description: Terminal font to use. It should be a mono spaced nerd font variant

terminal_font_size.description: Font size to use in terminal, JetBrains Mono recommends 13

features.description: Feature flags that enable / disable functionality

neovim_nightly.description: Enable neovim-nightly, fallback to latest neovim stable release (through nix-unstable)

neovim_avante.description: Enable avante AI tooling in neovim

github_auth_token.description: Basic token from https://github.com/settings/personal-access-tokens. Required to avoid API rate limiting for things like nix

tailscale_name.description: Tailscale name used for TLD when resolving hostanmes, see https://login.tailscale.com/admin/dns

asdf_nodejs_version.description: Version of nodejs installed by asdf in my home directory
